name: Echoes of Tikkun
description:
Echoes of Tikkun is the finished product of a semester of work by the Video Game Development Association at Cal State Long Beach. Guide the monk Zimri on a journey to discover the secrets of his world and restore the music of the gods to his people

EXPLORE A SACRED CAVE:

Navigate through mazelike levels with a rhythmic infinite jump, discovering secrets of the world along the way.

SOLVE MUSICAL PUZZLES:

Repair the ancient instrument within the cave by completing challenges of tone and rhythm

QUEST FOR THE GODS:

Uncover the truth about the creation of this world, and help Zimri change the fate of humanity!
